data.title: John Cleese opens up how his 4th marriage is 'biggest bonus' of life
meta_keywords: John Cleese opens up how his 4th marriage is 'biggest bonus' of life
data.meta_description: John Cleese has opened up about his fourth marriage which is "the biggest bonus" of his life.The 75-year-old actor, who wed the 43-year-old blonde jewellery designer Jennifer Wade in 2012 in an intimate Caribbean ceremony, said that he "nailed it" as he has finally got it right, the Mirror reported.The former 'James Bond' star, who is very lucky to have found love at this stage in his life, added that it's infinitely better than winning an Oscar or anything like that, or making 10million pounds, because that's where happiness really lies.Cleese's first marriage to 'Fawlty Towers' co-star Connie Booth, with whom he has a daughter Cynthia, lasted a decade, then his marriage with actress Barbara Trentham, mother of his second daughter Camilla, lasted nine years and then a third marriage, to Alyce-Faye Eichelberger, also ended in divorce in 2008.However, Cleese insisted that marriage is absolutely something he would recommend and thinks that to get a proper, loving relationship at this ...
